text: int main ( ) { int n , c , d ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; int i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { c = a [ i ] [ j ] ; d = a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; if ( c > d ) { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += c ; } else { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += d ; } } } printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; return 0 ; }
